message:
Hello guys
I need something you can suggest for C++/Python developer to learn Java.
I get really bored "Sometimes I feel hate towards java" with the tutorials and I need something to wrap me up with the OOP model java uses, best practices, what to do, I coded java in few courses in collage, yet I didn't code java enough, on the other hand I coded C++ and python much more.

Any suggestions ?

data.message: El java 7lwa mfeesh klam. What's getting you bored of java?
I always liked C++ more than any programming language I've used before :D ... Sorry man can't motivate you other than to dwell in C++ much more .

check this if you good in c++ and oop it will be easy :)
http://www.tutorialspoint.com/java/
Search for TheNewBoston channel on youtube

it might help ,it's one video to learn what's essential almost 30 minutes(https://goo.gl/PncWjr), and another one which is an hour and half  (https://goo.gl/fFnX8e ) , i will let you choose depending on your time and the comments below the videos and my recommendation is the second one (1 hour and half)
